name: Renderosity - Dark
description: Very dark blue theme for the Renderosity site.  Fonts are mostly unchanged, and only colors and backgrounds are changed.  - by kobaltkween
additional_info:
Second version, with updates for missing styles for areas like Site Mail and the selected category in the Marketplace.  Feel free to use this as a basis for your own edit.  I listed the elements of the color scheme at the beginning so you can search and replace for them.

8-31-2011
Third version, with updates for the forum and other minor corrections.
